title: Login issue on website
description: Customer reports being unable to log in using Google account integration. The login button redirects to Google, but after authentication it returns an error page instead of logging in. Issue started after the latest website update.

title: Payment failed
description: Customer attempted to pay with a valid credit card, but the transaction was declined multiple times despite sufficient balance. The customer is worried their order might be cancelled if not resolved quickly.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer tried resetting their password three times. They did not receive the reset link in either inbox or spam folder. The issue may be related to the email server not triggering notifications.

title: App crashes on launch
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after opening on devices running Android 14. Several customers have reported this issue, suggesting it may be a compatibility problem with the new OS update.

title: Slow website loading
description: Customer reports the website takes over 10 seconds to load on both desktop and mobile. They mentioned the problem occurs mainly during peak hours, which may indicate a server capacity issue.

title: Invoice not generated
description: After completing the checkout process, the system did not generate an invoice for the last transaction. Customer needs the invoice urgently for reimbursement purposes.

title: Order stuck in processing
description: Customer placed an order two days ago, but it is still showing as 'Processing' in the system. The payment has already been deducted from their account. They are frustrated and requesting an update.

title: Refund not received
description: Customer claims their refund was approved last week, but the money has not yet been credited back to their account. They provided transaction ID and request urgent action.

title: Broken product delivered
description: Customer received damaged headphones with a broken headband and non-functioning speakers. They want a replacement or full refund as soon as possible.

title: Feature request - Dark mode
description: Customer suggests adding a dark mode option to improve usability at night and reduce eye strain. They note that many competitor apps already offer this feature.

title: Subscription auto-renewal failed
description: Customer’s premium plan did not auto-renew despite having a valid payment method on file. They temporarily lost access to premium features and request a quick fix.

title: Notification issue
description: Push notifications are not being delivered to iOS users. Customers are missing important order updates. The issue seems to have started after the last app update.

title: Data sync error
description: Customer reports that their data is not syncing properly between the mobile and web app. Changes made on one platform are not reflected on the other.

title: Cart not updating
description: Items added to the shopping cart disappear after refreshing the page. Customer tried multiple browsers and devices with the same issue.

title: Delayed delivery
description: Customer’s package is delayed by 3 days beyond the expected delivery date. Tracking shows no updates since the item left the warehouse.
